text: The 2019–20 season was CA Oradea's 43rd season, 38th in the Romanian football league system and their 2nd season in the Liga IV. "The white and greens" were ranked 1st in the Liga IV Bihor at the end of the season and were crowned as champions. This season was the third one for the club after 54 years of inactivity. The season was postponed in May 2020 after 2 months of inactivity due to COVID-19 pandemic. == First-team squad == :Last updated on 25 May 2020 {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;
